name: CCRI 1941 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1941 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1941 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CD_1941_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1941 Census division (CD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CSD_1941_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1941 Census subdivision (CSD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_digitized_published_tables.pdf
distribution.description: Summary of all tables from the 1911 to 1951 censuses digitized by the CCRI.

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1941_v2t32.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 2, Table 32. Title: Population by principal origins, for census subdivisions, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 32, pp. 320-507. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1941_v2t38.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 2, Table 38. Title: Population by selected religious denominations, for census subdivisions, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 38, pp. 550-641. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1941_v5t4.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 5, Table 4. Title: Buildings, dwellings, households and families, showing tenure and type of dwelling, and composition of households and families, for counties, rural and urban, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 5, Table 4, pp. 6-55. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CD_1941.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1941 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CSD_1941.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1941 Census at the Census subdivision (CSD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_User_Guide_excerpts.pdf
distribution.description: Excerpts from the CCRI User Guide relevant to the geographic and aggregate data components of the CCRI.

distribution.name: IRCS_guide_d'usage_extraits.pdf
distribution.description: Extraits du guide d'usage de l'IRCS reliés aux éléments du c​adre géographique et de l'ensemble de données agrégées de l'IRCS.

distribution.name: IRCS_tableaux_publiés_numérisés.pdf
distribution.description: Sommaire de tous les tableaux des recensements de 1911 à 1951 numérisés par l'IRCS.

distribution.name: Reference_Maps_1941.zip
distribution.description: A collection of maps in .pdf format detailing the 1941 census geography for each province.

distribution.name: v2t32_1941.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1941, Vol. 2, Table 32.

distribution.name: v2t38_1941.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1941, Vol. 2, Table 38.

distribution.name: v5t4_1941.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1941, Vol. 5, Table 4.
